step1.title: Data Collection Notice
step1.informationText: Your personal information is being collected for TM30 reporting requirements as mandated by Thai Immigration Law. This data is necessary for compliance with immigration regulations and will be used solely for this purpose.
step1.retentionText: All personal data collected will be automatically deleted from our systems after 7 days. This ensures your privacy while meeting legal compliance requirements.
step1.securityText: Your information is encrypted and stored securely. Access is restricted to authorized personnel only for the purpose of TM30 reporting to Thai Immigration authorities.
step1.consentText: I acknowledge that I have read and understood the data collection notice above. I consent to the collection and processing of my personal data for TM30 reporting purposes and understand that this data will be deleted after 7 days.

step2.title: Room Selection
step2.helperText: Please pick the total number of rooms you have booked.

step3.title: Number of Guests
step3.guestSelectionHelper: Select the number of guests staying in the same room
step3.numberOfNightsHelper: Eg If you are staying from 3rd May to 5th May, number of nights is 2
step3.passportPhotoHelper: Please upload a clear passport photo. The photo will be used for identification purposes.

step4.title: Hotel and Contact Information
step4.emailHelper: You will receive your room key information at this email address
step4.hotelHelper: Hotel id is next to the QR code
step4.roomHelper: Pick the room number you will be staying in
step4.roomKeyHelper: Your room key number will be sent to your email after registration

step5.title: Guest Information
step5.requiredFieldsGuest1: Please fill in all required fields and upload passport photo for Guest 1 before submitting.
step5.requiredFieldsGuest2: Please fill in all required fields and upload passport photo for Guest 2 before submitting.
step5.successMessage: Registration successful! Your submission ID is: {{submissionId}}. You will receive an email shortly with your room key information.

step6.title: Thank You for Registering!
step6.emailSentText: The following information has been sent to your email address:
step6.welcomeText: Thank you for completing your TM30 registration. Your registration has been submitted successfully.
step6.helpText: If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact the hotel reception.
step6.enjoyStayText: We hope you enjoy your stay!
step6.privacyNotice: Note: Your personal data will be automatically deleted from our system after 7 days as per our privacy policy.
step6.keepRecordsText: Please keep this information for your records and check your email for the official confirmation.

summary.emailConfirmationNotice: Email confirmations have been sent to each registered email address with room-specific details.
